text: Arau ami yikono raachula praerana karaicho seya kerala e'i babe ye, yate allahara anumatikrame te'omlokara anugatya karaa haya, yetiya sihamte nijara prati an'yaya karae tetiya sihamte tomara ocarata ahile arau allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karaile arau raachule'o sihamtara bisaye ksama bicaraile sihamte niscaya allahaka parama ksamasila arau parama dayaluraupe paba
